content:
Colonel-General Alexander Sirsky said this in a telephone conversation with the chief of the United Staff of the French Republic of the French Republic General of the Army General by the Army by the Army Burikar.

About conversation with French colleague Alexander Sirskyreported March 21.

“He thanked the Government of the French Republic and the French people for the constant and consistent support of Ukraine. He expressed his gratitude separately for the assistance provided for the preparation of Ukrainian servicemen in the territory of France, ”Alexander Sirsky wrote.

BeforeThe Armyinform reportedthat France did not recognize and the results of the "elections" of the President of Russia.
title: Alexander Syrsky: Defense forces have managed to stabilize the situation in eastern Ukraine
description: Alexander Sirsky reported on the conversation with French colleague on March 21. “Thank you ...
author: Army Inform
